name: redis-command-api-mapping-mcp
description: MCP Server for Redis Command-to-API Mapping (Rust WASM + Node.js)

scripts.build: npm run build:rust && npm run build:node
scripts.build:rust: cd rust && cargo build --release && wasm-pack build --target nodejs
scripts.clean: npm run clean:rust && npm run clean:node
scripts.clean:rust: cd rust && cargo clean && rm -rf wasm/pkg
scripts.clean:node: cd node && rm -rf dist node_modules && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:rust && npm run test:node
